section.title: Chemistry License
section.p: In case you have a Chemistry license key then you will be able to generate PDF output that is not stamped with the Chemistry logo image.
To install your Chemistry license key:

ol.li: In case you are using the already bundled Chemistry, save the license key text in a file with the name licensekey.txt in the DITA-OT-DIR\plugins\com.oxygenxml.pdf.css\lib\oxygen-pdf-chemistry folder.
In case you prefer another Chemistry installation, outside the plugin, make sure you place the licensekey.txt file in that folder.

section.title: Publishing Engine License
section.p: In case you have licensed the Oxygen Publishing Engine you will be able to produce both PDF and WebHelp output without any restrictions.
To install your Oxygen Publishing Engine license key, save the license key text in a file with the name licensekey.txt in the DITA-OT-DIR folder.
